Text: Nobody ever said a great gift needs to arrive FAST: please upload at whatever speed is convenient for you, friend. (Just let us know if you need to stop for more than 24 hours, so we can tell you from a troll--of whom there are way too many on this site!)
YOW! If that had downloaded any faster, it might have scorched my wi-fi router! You have nothing to apologize for, ajaxen94. Thanks very much for the upload.

@LasarusL the speed you downloaded it at was probably due to the people who had already downloaded it and were seeding it at the time, it usually takes about 1 hour for people to download 100 mbs from me so thanks really go to the people who seed it after their download has finished
